channel.title: Ritualist End Screen Color
channel.description:
I don't know if this is supposed to happen, but the converted Ritualist's color is Blue compared to what the Cult classes' color should be, Red.
[https://imgur.com/a/hJV8s](https://imgur.com/a/hJV8s)
